column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////After talking about coming here for ages and ages
column2: I finally came on a whim yesterday afternoon with my friend. I ordered a vanilla latte and we shared the chocolate walnut cookie. The latte was slightly too sweet for my own personal taste
column3: but the coffee itself was very aromatic! The chocolate walnut cookie was heavenly: crispy on the outside
column4: warm and chewy on the inside. I don't know how they achieved such texture perfection
column5: but these cookies would be dangerous in large quantities. I will definitely be back to try the almond croissant and the macarons!
